title: The Effect of Employee Competence and Work Motivation on the Quality of Financial Reporting
data:
M Irawati, AS Arief, M Yunus- Journal La Bisecoman, 2026
This study aims to determine whether employee competence and work motivation 
have an influence on the quality of financial reporting at the Office of the Airport 
Authority Region V Makassar. The data in this research were obtained through the 
distribution of questionnaires as the primary instrument. The sampling technique 
used was the saturated sample method, where all members of the population were

title: Survey on Learning-based Dynamic Fault Localization: From Traditional Machine Learning to Large Language Models
data:
C Liu, Y Lei, H Xie, J Wang, Y Yu, D Lo- ACM Computing Surveys
Learning-based dynamic fault localization techniques play a crucial role in the field 
of software engineering. These techniques dynamically execute test cases to 
meticulously extract useful knowledge from the execution information in the program, 
with the aim of identifying fault locations by leveraging machine learning, deep 
learning, and large language models. Currently, there is already a flourishing body of 
research that is intensely focused on learning-based dynamic fault localization
Trch dn: Thanh Le-Cong, Ratnadira Widyasari, Chakkrit Tantithamthavorn
author: Thanh Le-Cong
ref: 4 lời trích dẫn mới đến bài viết của Thanh Le-Cong

title: AI builds, We Analyze: An Empirical Study of AI-Generated Build Code Quality
data:
A Ghammam, M Almukhtar- arXiv preprint arXiv:2601.16839, 2026
The rapid adoption of AI coding agents for software development has raised 
important questions about the quality and maintainability of the code they produce. 
While prior studies have examined AI-generated source code, the impact of AI 
coding agents on build systems-a critical yet understudied component of the software 
lifecycle-remains largely unexplored. This data mining challenge focuses on AIDev, 
the first large-scale, openly available dataset capturing agent-authored pull requests
Trch dn: Thanh Le-Cong, Ratnadira Widyasari, Chakkrit Tantithamthavorn
